Class MeteorSwarmState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.AdventureState
it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.MeteorSwarmStates.MeteorSwarmState
public class MeteorSwarmState extends AdventureState
Represents the state in which a meteor from a MeteorSwarm adventure card is about to impact.

In this state, the game determines whether there are more meteors to resolve. If so, it prompts the appropriate player to roll dice and generate a coordinate for the next incoming meteor. If all meteors have already been handled, the state transitions to IdleState.

The state is responsible for informing players of whether a new hit is incoming or if the meteor swarm is over.

    • MeteorSwarmState

      public MeteorSwarmState(AdventurePhase advContext, int iterationsHit)
      Constructs a MeteorSwarmState with the given context and the current meteor index.
      Parameters:
      advContext - The current AdventurePhase context.
      iterationsHit - The number of meteors already handled.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the meteor swarm sequence.

      If all meteors have been resolved, notifies all players and transitions to IdleState. Otherwise, notifies the first player to roll dice and begin the next meteor resolution.

      Overrides:
      initialize in class AdventureState

    • getCoordinate

      public Hit getCoordinate(String username)
      Generates the coordinate for the next meteor hit based on dice rolls.

      Once the coordinate is determined, the state transitions to HandleMeteor to handle the meteor resolution.

      Overrides:
      getCoordinate in class AdventureState
      Parameters:
      username - The username of the player rolling the dice.
      Returns:
      The Hit object with the computed coordinate.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If it is not the calling player's turn.
